contact.name: Name

items.a: ProjeXtPal supports all major methodologies: PRINCE2, Scrum, Agile, Waterfall, Kanban, SAFe, MSP, and hybrid approaches.

items.q: How does the AI assistance work?
items.a: Our AI analyzes your project data and provides suggestions for planning, identifies risks, generates reports and helps with decision-making.
Yes! You can try ProjeXtPal free for 14 days without a credit card.

items.q: Can teams of different sizes use ProjeXtPal?
items.a: Absolutely! From small teams to large enterprises - ProjeXtPal scales with you.

items.q: Do you integrate with other tools?
items.a: Yes, we integrate with popular tools like Jira, Slack, Microsoft Teams, and more.

footer.description: ProjeXtPal - AI-Powered Platform for Programs & Projects
